about_the_game:
■ Single story
This is the story of the earth that exists in the multiverse.

You are a sumo wrestler, a traditional national sport that Japan is proud of.
I dreamed of becoming the highest-ranked "Yokozuna", the greatest medal for sumo wrestlers, and worked hard day and night to practice.

One day, you heard a rumor that all-purpose power was sealed in the winning trophy "Chan-Kona" of Morodashi Sumo.
I decided to take on the challenge of "Morodashi Sumo Battle Tournament" as a test of strength.

Use all the wrestlers of "grab", "push", and "fly" to prove your existence to the yokozuna "Sumo King" who is waiting on the throne!

■ Local 2P match
Select a sumo wrestler from [8 default characters, up to 8 edit characters]
Let's enjoy sumo wrestling with friends who are close to us!

■ Online 2P match
Choose a sumo wrestler from [8 default characters, up to 8 edit characters] and jump into battle with the whole world.
It is also good to participate in the war with an edit character and show off your proud coordination! Show off your battle sense and visual sense!

■ Avatar creation
Customize [name, body, hairstyle, face type, face details, facial expressions, colors, accessories] to create your own alter ego!
* We have introduced a novel accessory system, so please feel free to touch it.

■ Avatar Shop
By using the prize money obtained from MORODASHI SUMO, you will randomly acquire accessories that can be used with avatars.
Accessories that you don't know how to use at first glance may be coolly equipped depending on your ideas !

============================================================
Broadcasting & posting videos of gameplay and monetizing them are all OK!
============================================================

content_descriptors.notes: "Morodashi Sumo" is a battle game in which you control a character wearing a Mawashi(Loincloth). When the character falls, the Mawashi will come off and the lower half of the body will become nude. The nude part is hidden by the light effect, so you cannot actually see it.

detailed_description:
■ Single story
This is the story of the earth that exists in the multiverse.

You are a sumo wrestler, a traditional national sport that Japan is proud of.
I dreamed of becoming the highest-ranked "Yokozuna", the greatest medal for sumo wrestlers, and worked hard day and night to practice.

One day, you heard a rumor that all-purpose power was sealed in the winning trophy "Chan-Kona" of Morodashi Sumo.
I decided to take on the challenge of "Morodashi Sumo Battle Tournament" as a test of strength.

Use all the wrestlers of "grab", "push", and "fly" to prove your existence to the yokozuna "Sumo King" who is waiting on the throne!

■ Local 2P match
Select a sumo wrestler from [8 default characters, up to 8 edit characters]
Let's enjoy sumo wrestling with friends who are close to us!

■ Online 2P match
Choose a sumo wrestler from [8 default characters, up to 8 edit characters] and jump into battle with the whole world.
It is also good to participate in the war with an edit character and show off your proud coordination! Show off your battle sense and visual sense!

■ Avatar creation
Customize [name, body, hairstyle, face type, face details, facial expressions, colors, accessories] to create your own alter ego!
* We have introduced a novel accessory system, so please feel free to touch it.

■ Avatar Shop
By using the prize money obtained from MORODASHI SUMO, you will randomly acquire accessories that can be used with avatars.
Accessories that you don't know how to use at first glance may be coolly equipped depending on your ideas !

name: MORODASHI SUMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Do you know the traditional Japanese national sport "Morodashi Sumo"? You can use any hand, so let's remove the opponent's "Mawashi". If you make the opponent "Morodashi", you win.
